{"image": "//ukcdn.ar-cdn.com/recipes/port512/6b793a8f-f92e-4f51-a7b4-95e316aaea32.jpg", "ingredients": ["500g (1 lb) beef mince", "1 slice bread, crumbled", "1 egg", "1 to 2 tablespoons mustard", "3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce", "salt and pepper to taste"], "steps": ["In a large bowl, combine the beef, bread, egg, mustard and Worcestershire sauce and mix well. Form into 6 to 8 burgers and season with salt and pepper to taste.", "Barbecue or fry in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook the burgers for 10 to 15 minutes, or until desired doneness."], "name": "Bloke Burgers", "prep_time": "5 min", "cook_time": "15 min", "rating": 4.5, "recipe_url": "http://allrecipes.co.uk/recipe/1023/bloke-burgers.aspx"}
